text: when i use HubSpot SMTP API to fetch email templates which I created in HubSpot and send them through our application code,then there is change in email format like css,font,linespaces. How to fetch and send exact email template in HubSpot through our application code?

Hi,
I'm trying to set association between Deals and Line Items. Please help me  to fix this. Below is the curl
curl --location --request PUT '<https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v4/objects/deal/15906438986/associations/line_items/7313335049>' \
--header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
--header 'Authorization: Bearer XXXXXXX' \
--*data* '[
    {
        "associationCategory": "HubSpot_DEFINED",
        "associationTypeId": 4
    }
]
'
